org.apache.beam.it.gcp.secretmanager

Class SecretManagerResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.it.gcp.secretmanager.SecretManagerResourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.beam.it.common.ResourceManager

    public class SecretManagerResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.beam.it.common.ResourceManager
    Default class for implementation of ResourceManager interface.

    The class provides an interaction with the real GCP Secret Manager client, with operations related to management of Secrets in the SecretManager.

      • createSecret

        public void createSecret(java.lang.String secretId,
                         java.lang.String secretData)
        Creates a Secret with given name on GCP Secret Manager.
        Parameters:
        secretId - Secret ID of the secret to be created
        secretData - Value of the secret to be added

      • addSecretVersion

        public void addSecretVersion(java.lang.String secretId,
                             java.lang.String secretData)
        Creates a new SecretVersion containing secret data and attaches it to an existing Secret.
        Parameters:
        secretId - Parent secret to which version will be added
        secretData - Value of the secret to be added

      • accessSecret

        public java.lang.String accessSecret(java.lang.String secretVersion)
        Calls Secret Manager with a Secret Version and returns the secret value.
        Parameters:
        secretVersion - Secret Version of the form projects/{project}/secrets/{secret}/versions/{secret_version}
        Returns:
        the secret value in Secret Manager

      • enableSecretVersion

        public void enableSecretVersion(java.lang.String secretVersion)
        Enables a SecretVersion. Sets the state of the SecretVersion to ENABLED.
        Parameters:
        secretVersion - The resource name of the SecretVersion to destroy in the format of projects/{project}/secrets/{secret}/versions/{secret_version}

      • disableSecretVersion

        public void disableSecretVersion(java.lang.String secretVersion)
        Disables a SecretVersion. Sets the state of the SecretVersion to DISABLED.
        Parameters:
        secretVersion - The resource name of the SecretVersion to destroy in the format of projects/{project}/secrets/{secret}/versions/{secret_version}

      • destroySecretVersion

        public void destroySecretVersion(java.lang.String secretVersion)
        Sets the state of the SecretVersion to DESTROYED and irrevocably destroys the secret data.
        Parameters:
        secretVersion - The resource name of the SecretVersion to destroy in the format of projects/{project}/secrets/{secret}/versions/{secret_version}

      • deleteSecret

        public void deleteSecret(java.lang.String secretId)
        Deletes a Secret.
        Parameters:
        secretId - The resource name of the SecretVersion to delete in the format of projects/{project}/secrets/{secret}/versions/{secret_version}

      • cleanupAll

        public void cleanupAll()
        Specified by:
        cleanupAll in interface org.apache.beam.it.common.ResourceManager
